allow: Bash(gh repo create n8n-nodes-fal --public --source=. --remote=origin --description="n8n community nodes for Fal.ai - AI model endpoints for image generation, video generation, and more")

Bash(git commit -m "feat: add Queue resource for granular queue control

- Add Submit Request operation to queue requests
- Add Get Status operation to check request status with logs
- Add Stream Status operation for real-time updates via SSE
- Add Get Response operation to retrieve completed results
- Add Cancel Request operation to cancel queued requests
- Support webhook callbacks for asynchronous processing
- Full control over Fal queue API for advanced workflows
- Update CHANGELOG to document queue management feature")

Bash(git commit -m "docs: add quick start guide for immediate n8n usage

- Step-by-step installation instructions
- 4 ready-to-use example workflows
- Troubleshooting section
- Publishing guide for npm
- Direct links to test the node immediately")

Bash(git commit -m "chore: prepare package for npm publishing

- Add bugs URL to package.json for better npm page
- Expand keywords for better discoverability (openai, anthropic, google, workflow, queue, etc.)
- Update .npmignore to exclude development files
- Keep documentation files (README, USAGE_GUIDE, QUICK_START, CHANGELOG) in package
- Package size: 36 KB (235 KB unpacked)")

Bash(git commit -m "docs: add comprehensive npm publishing guide

- Step-by-step publishing instructions
- Prerequisites (npm account, 2FA setup)
- Pre-publishing checks and verification
- Future update guidelines (patch/minor/major)
- Troubleshooting common issues
- Best practices and success checklist
- Post-publishing promotion strategies")

Bash(git commit -m "chore: publish as scoped package @ibracob.dev/n8n-nodes-fal

The unscoped name ''n8n-nodes-fal'' was already taken on npm.
Using scoped package under ibracob.dev organization.

Published to: https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ibracob.dev/n8n-nodes-fal")

Bash(git commit -m "style: fix code formatting for CI

- Fix formatting in queue/execute/index.ts
- Fix formatting in workflow/execute/index.ts
- Ensure CI build passes")

Bash(git commit -m "docs: update package name to @ibracob.dev/n8n-nodes-fal

- Update installation instructions across all docs
- Reflect scoped package name in README, QUICK_START, and USAGE_GUIDE
- Package is now published at: https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ibracob.dev/n8n-nodes-fal")

Bash(git commit -m "fix: correct node type reference in Fal.node.json

- Change node reference from ''n8n-nodes-base.fal'' to ''@ibracob.dev/n8n-nodes-fal.fal''
- This fixes the ''Unrecognized node type'' error in n8n
- Update primary documentation URL to GitHub repo
- Bump version to 1.0.1")
Bash(git add package.json nodes/Fal/Fal.node.json credentials/fal-ai-logo.svg nodes/Fal/fal-ai-logo.svg)

Bash(git commit -m "v1.0.1: fix node type reference and update logo

- Fix: Change node reference from ''n8n-nodes-base.fal'' to ''@ibracob.dev/n8n-nodes-fal.fal''
- Resolves ''Unrecognized node type'' error in n8n
- Update logo to official Fal wordmark design
- Update documentation URL to GitHub repository")

Bash(git commit -m "v1.0.2: fix node reference (remove .fal extension)

- The node reference should be just the package name, not package-name.fal
- Working example uses: ""node"": ""n8n-nodes-fal""
- Fixed to: ""node"": ""@ibracob.dev/n8n-nodes-fal""
- This matches how actuallyzefe''s working package is configured
- Verified auth and queue polling implementation matches Fal API docs")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
v1.0.3: fix node reference to use internal node name

- Change node reference from package name to internal node name: "fal"
- Per n8n documentation, the codex "node" field should reference the internal node name
- The internal node name is defined in Fal.node.ts as name: ''fal''
- This resolves "Unrecognized node type" error
- Verified against n8n community node standards
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
v1.0.4: fix missing Fal.node.json in published package

- Add buildNodeJson task to gulpfile to copy .node.json files to dist
- The Fal.node.json codex file was missing from the published package
- This caused n8n to fail to recognize the node type
- Now the .node.json file is properly included in the npm package
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
v0.1.1: migrate to official @n8n/node-cli and fix node type reference

BREAKING CHANGE: Package renamed from @ibracob.dev/n8n-nodes-fal to @ibracob.dev/n8n-nodes-falai

Critical fixes:
- Fix Fal.node.json "node" field to use package name instead of internal name
- This resolves "Unrecognized node type" error

Migrate to official n8n tooling:
- Install @n8n/node-cli for building and linting
- Add "strict": true to n8n configuration
- Update build scripts to use n8n-node CLI
- Remove custom gulpfile.js (n8n-node handles assets)
- Add manual copy step for .node.json file

Dependency updates:
- Upgrade eslint to ^9.32.0 (required by @n8n/node-cli)
- Add n8n-workflow to devDependencies

This package now follows n8n community node best practices and matches
the working implementation from actuallyzefe/n8n-nodes-fal.
EOF
)")
